content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5) connected by pipe groups.

### Copper plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0) are not directly connected, but are part of the same mining operation
- Multiple furnaces at positions(x=45.0, y=-83.0), (x=42.0, y=-81.0), (x=45.0, y=-80.0), and (x=40.0, y=-79.0) with corresponding wooden chests

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Assembling machine is not present in the provided logs, but inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5) and wooden chest(position x=2.5, y=0.5) are part of the factory
- Belt group is not explicitly mentioned, but pipe groups connect the offshore pump to the boiler

### Lab at position(x=0.5, y=0.5)
Consists of a lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 67} and two burners inserter(position x=3.5, y=0.5) and (position x=0.5, y=3.5) with corresponding wooden chests

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure the target position is empty before placing an entity
- Move closer to the target position if it is too far away to place the entity

### Errors when connecting entities
- Need more than one waypoint to connect entities

### Errors when using furnaces
- Furnaces need ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has fuel to operate

### Errors when using boilers
- Boilers need to be connected to a fluid system
- Ensure the boiler has fuel to operate

### Errors when using inserter
- Inserter needs source items to operate
- Ensure the inserter has fuel to operate

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Offshore pump needs to be connected to a pipe group
- Ensure the offshore pump is working correctly

### Errors when using steam engine
- Steam engine needs input liquid to operate
- Ensure the steam engine is connected to a pipe group
